# `select_spatialNetwork`

Select spatial network


## Description

Select spatial network


## Usage

```r
select_spatialNetwork(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_spatialNetwork`](#getspatialnetwork)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("name")), list("name of spatial network")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("output")), list("object type to return as. Options: 'spatialNetworkObj' (default),\n", "'networkDT' and 'networkDT_before_filter' for data.table outputs.")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("spat_unit")), list("spatial unit (e.g. \"cell\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("set_defaults")), list("set default spat_unit and feat_type. Change to FALSE only when")), 
    "\n", "  ")
